# Cisco Integrated Management Controller (IMC)

## Key facts

* MSG Format based filter
* None conformant legacy BSD Format default port 514

| Ref            | Link                                                                                                    |
|----------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Splunk Add-on  | na                                                               |
| Product Manual | multiple |

| cisco:ucm     |  None                                                                                                    |
